docs.text: Welcome to Cryosoft's Apis Cryosoft is committed to having your applications upto date. You can keep upto speed with our app versions using our apis in the case you want to use our applications. The APIs enlisted here are all REST apis and give results in the form of JSON. Getting a list of all Applications available To get a list of all applications, you simply have to make a GET request to /api which will give you a JSON of all applications currently being managed and versioned. You can try with the following link: https://updates.cryosoft.co.ke/api Getting an app information To get a complete List of information concerning an application, make a GET request to /api/[app-name] where [app-name] is the name of the application you wish to get the information for. An example of such a request is: https://updates.cryosoft.co.ke/api/masiri
docs.title: Home

docs.text: We have set up an API that will allow you to get COVID19 Kenyan updates and allow you to make your own dashboard. HTTP Methods The API can be accesssed though GET HTTP method API Location The API can be consumed here at: https://covid19.cryosoft.co.ke/api/ Example Response The response of the API is as follows. { "country": "Kenya", "cases": 2216, "todayCases": 123, "deaths": 74, "todayDeaths": 3, "recovered": 553, "active": 1589, "critical": 7, "casesPerOneMillion": 41, "deathsPerOneMillion": 1, "totalTests": 85058, "testsPerOneMillion": 1585, "url": "https://covid19.cryosoft.co.ke/api/", "documentation": "https://updates.cryosoft.co.ke/documentation/#covid19" } Authentication The COVID19 Statistics doesn't require any authentication to get the data. Attribution Please attribute the API to Cryosoft Corporation by linking it as follows in your dashboard: API provided by: by Cryosoft Corporation
docs.title: COVID19 Kenya Statistics API
